abundance-table-rank.title: Abundance table with counts per taxa
abundance-table-rank.description: Per-taxa counts TSV, including all samples.

bracken-report.title: Bracken report file
bracken-report.description: TSV file with the abundance of each taxa. See more info here: https://github.com/jenniferlu717/Bracken#output-kraken-style-bracken-report.

kraken-report.title: Kraken2 taxonomic assignment per read (Kraken2 pipeline)
kraken-report.description: Lineage-aggregated counts. See more info here: https://github.com/DerrickWood/kraken2/blob/master/docs/MANUAL.markdown#sample-report-output-format.

kraken-assignments.title: Kraken2 taxonomic asignment per read (Kraken2 pipeline)
kraken-assignments.description: TSV file with the taxonomic assignment per read. See more info here: https://github.com/DerrickWood/kraken2/blob/master/docs/MANUAL.markdown#standard-kraken-output-format.

host-bam.title: Host BAM file
host-bam.description: BAM file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the host reference.

host-bai.title: BAM index file of host reads
host-bai.description: BAM index file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the host reference.

minimap2-bam.title: BAM file (minimap2)
minimap2-bam.description: BAM file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the reference.

minimap2-index.title: BAM index file (minimap2)
minimap2-index.description: Index file generated from mapping filtered input reads to the reference.

amr-report.title: JSON file with identified AMR genes (amr)
amr-report.description: JSON file with abricate results. See more info here: https://github.com/tseemann/abricate#output.
